resources.string: To use the Arriving in Berlin app, please read and accept the privacy policy as well as the general terms of business of the Arriving in Berlin app. By selecting “Accept” you declare your consent and can continue. If you do not wish to continue and wish to close the app, select “Decline and Close App.”
You can also use the Arriving in Berlin app to find open and free networks of the Berlin Freifunknetz.
